seo.metaDescription: Professional CA services: audit, tax, and advisory. Building trust through numbers. ICAI member.

bio.heading: About
paragraphs: I am a practising Chartered Accountant with a focus on audit, tax, and advisory services for businesses and individuals.
My approach centres on clarity, compliance, and long-term value for clients.
highlights: Years of experience in statutory audit and internal audit
Direct and indirect tax planning and compliance
